# **Strava Journal**
### Rob Franken - Radboud University
Last compiled on `r format(Sys.time(), '%B, %Y')`

----

<br>

This lab journal is created for the Strava paper. It contains R code.       
All scripts can be found on [Github](https://github.com/robfranken/STRAVA-paper)

<br>

----

# Content

By now, we have:

1. imported the raw club data, anonymized them, and stored them in a list object (clubdata.RData)

2. created RSiena objects for each club and stored them in a list file (clubdata_rsiena.RData)

In the following pages, we will:

3. perform descriptive analyses

4. perform exploratory analyses to find the best model

5. estimate the final models
